name: Blink
text: Portal Manipulation — Action: Return 1 [[portal]] upgrade from play to your hand. (Limit once per round.) Response: After you change to this form, shuffle 1 [[portal]] upgrade from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Clarice Ferguson
text: Deserved Vacation — Forced Response: After you change to this form, shuffle each [[portal]] upgrade from play into your deck. Heal 2 damage from your identity for each upgrade shuffled this way. "I've decided that I need a break myself…"

name: Sabretooth
text: Response: After Sabretooth enters your hand, if there is a [[portal]] upgrade in play, put Sabretooth into play under your control. "I don't make the rules. I just get screwed by 'em."

name: Assault Redirection
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a character would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent all of that damage. You may discard a [[portal]] upgrade attached to an enemy to deal damage to that enemy equal to the amount prevented this way. "I don't plan on dying at all! 'least, not today..." —Blink

name: Everywhere at Once
text: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal 2 damage to each enemy with a [[portal]] upgrade attached. Remove 2 threat from each scheme with a [[portal ]]upgrade attached. "I don't plan on dying at all! 'least, not today…" —Blink

name: Lose Footing
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 2 additional damage to that enemy for each [[portal]] upgrade attached to it. “I wasn't trying to port you away. I was trying to 'port you to pieces!” —Blink

name: Multiple 'porting
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Remove 2 additional threat from that scheme for each [[portal]] upgrade attached to it. "Blinking into solid objects is something I tend to avoid. For obvious reasons." —Blink

name: Crystal Palace
text: Response: After a [[portal]] upgrade is discarded from play, exhaust Crystal Palace → attach it facedown here. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Crystal Palace → add each [[portal]] upgrade attached here to your hand. “Who lives in a pineapple under the sea? SpongeBob SquarePants!” —Rachel Carpenter

name: Blink's Quiver
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Blink's Quiver → search your deck for a [[portal]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. “Have a nice trip! Don't forget to write!” —Blink

name: Portal
text: Hero form only. Attach to an enemy or a scheme. Interrupt: When attached enemy or scheme would be a target of an [[attack]] or [[thwart]] event, reduce that event's resource cost by 2. Discard this card after that event resolves.
